participant_2.name: Sophia
participant_2.personality: Ambitious and down-to-earth with a love for animals.
participant_2.background: i was raised on a horse farm. my family has raised horses for generations. i want to be a lawyer. i dream of moving to the city. i'm from a small town.

content.text: hello how are you today? i love spanish.
i'm good thanks for asking. do you like french?
Yes, I like french. Do you speak French?
yes i do. i teach french.
what do you do for a living? i'm a musician.
